expert.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who has a special skill or special knowledge of a subject, gained as a result of training or experience
expert.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Tests should be administered by a medical expert.
He’s a world expert on marine mammals.
expert.translation[0].definitions[0].not: Someone is an expert on a subject or issue
He’s an expert on the Cold War
He’s an expert of the Cold War
Someone is an expert in a field of study or an activity
She’s an expert in family law
She’s an expert of family law
expert.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: a leading expert
He is one of the country’s leading experts on Islam.
a world/international expert
She is a world expert on tropical diseases.
an independent expert
The authorities called in an independent expert to advise them.
a medical/legal/financial etc expert
Medical experts agree that screening can prevent deaths from breast cancer.
a so-called expert
There are many so-called experts willing to tell you how to bring up your children.
experts say something
Experts are saying that the economy is likely to improve towards the end of this year.
experts believe something
Legal experts believe that the evidence will not be accepted in court.
experts advise/recommend something
Most financial experts recommend that you don’t borrow money on credit cards.
talk to/consult an expert
If cracks appear in your house, you should consult an expert to find out what is causing the problem.
get/obtain/seek advice from an expert
Don’t make big financial decisions without first seeking advice from an expert.
a team/panel of experts
You can get advice from our panel of gardening experts.
expert.translation[0].note_box[1].sectio: someone who has a lot of knowledge about something or skill at doing something
a computer expert
an expert on beetles
It’s best to ask an expert.
specialist
an expert who has studied a particular medical or technical subject for a long time and knows much more about it than other people
She is a specialist in corporate finance.
My doctor sent me to see a heart specialist.
authority
an expert whose knowledge and opinions are greatly respected
The professor is one of the world’s leading authorities on African art.
connoisseur
an expert on food, art, literature, or design, who has had a lot of experience and knows when something is of very good quality
He was a connoisseur of fine wines.
His works are popular among connoisseurs.
buff
someone who is very interested in a subject and knows a lot about it
a wine buff
Jazz buffs will be familiar with the band’s first album.
virtuoso
an expert player or performer
The piece was played by violin virtuoso Pavel Sporcl.
a virtuoso pianist
expert.translation[1].definitions[0].def: having a special skill or special knowledge of a subject
expert.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He cast his expert eye on the gardener’s work.
The police are expert at handling situations like this in strict confidence.
expert.translation[1].definitions[1].def: relating to or coming from an expert
expert.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Ministers depend on civil servants for expert advice.
expert.translation[1].note_box[0].headin: – Meaning 2: relating to or coming from an expert
expert.translation[1].note_box[0].sectio: Get some expert advice before investing in a property.
Expert opinion on the matter is deeply divided.
Two doctors were called to give expert testimony at the inquiry.
He has expert knowledge of the plants and animals in this area.
To the expert eye, this is a beautiful example of early Roman pottery.
expert.translation[2].definitions[0].def: someone who has a special skill or special knowledge of an area of work or study, usually as the result of many years experience
expert.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: One of the functions of the marketing expert in commerce is to develop a clear idea of the target market.
You don’t have to be an expert in accountancy to use this software package.
expert.translation[3].definitions[0].def: advice etc given by an expert
expert.translation[3].definitions[0].exa: You should seek expert advice on this kind of investment.
